testcase.name: Verify slider updates the displayed value correctly
testcase.system-out: Given I open the slider webpage.............................................passed When I move the slider to "0.5".............................................passed Then I should see the displayed value as "0.5"..............................passed When I move the slider to "2.5".............................................passed Then I should see the displayed value as "2.5"..............................passed When I move the slider to "5"...............................................passed Then I should see the displayed value as "5"................................passed
